---

_The Waxworks_ represents helplessness and entropy. As long as you have this card invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that render you [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13), or [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15). The item bonus increases to +3 if you are 20th level.
